nodes.text: Mann was a male Human sergeant in the Republic Army during the Galactic War. He was stationed on the frozen ice planet of Hoth, where he sold weapons as a vendor.

Sergeant Mann appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendor for Republic players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Mann was removed from the game along with the rest of the Weapons Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
